extracted_information: Brelly.ai offers an AI-powered 'Smart Claims Copilot' software primarily for Public Adjusters, aiming to automate tasks, speed up claim handling (3x faster), and improve settlement wins. It also targets roofers, contractors, and homeowners. The platform focuses on eliminating paperwork, stalled claims, and generic software issues by providing an AI assistant trained on real claims, specific to the public adjuster's needs. Key functionalities include analyzing engineer reports, drafting communications, reviewing policies, summarizing claims, and generating client updates. The security features include HIPAA-grade security, end-to-end encryption, role-based access, and auto-logged audit trails. Onboarding is designed to be quick (90-minute setup) with ongoing support via expert-led calls, community access, and founder check-ins. The website emphasizes time savings and increased efficiency.

time_savings.details: Identifies inconsistencies and verifies licensure, saving 5-7 hr/week (Claims Efficiency Software).
Drafts carrier emails and denial responses in seconds, boosting productivity (Insurance Claims Efficiency).
Analyzes complex policies in seconds, reducing back-and-forth (Policy Analysis AI).
Summarizes claims, timelines, coverages, scope and contention points, helps resolve 20% more claims monthly.
AI-powered search with industry-specific knowledge base (e.g., Chris Voss negotiation tactics), saving $800/week in research time.
Auto-writes personalized updates, saving $800/week in staffing costs.

pricing.subscription_tiers: Not specified on the page; implies demo-based sales model.
pricing.free_trial_offerings: A 'Create Free Account' option is present, but no explicit 'free trial' details for the full software.
pricing.enterprise_vs_smb_focus: Primarily targets Public Adjusters, Roofers, Contractors (SMB/professional focus), with a beta for Policyholders. Less focus on large enterprises.

features.name: Claims Management Workflows
features.description: Automates tasks, handles heavy lifting for claims management, and aims to win settlements 3x faster. Focuses on saving time and eliminating paperwork.

features.name: AI Integration Capabilities
features.description: Smart Claims Copilot, an AI assistant trained specifically for Public Adjusters, Roofers, Contractors, and Homeowners. Analyzes reports, crafts rebuttals, drafts communications, and performs smart searches.

features.name: Document Management and Processing
features.description: Engineer Report Tool to analyze reports, find inconsistencies, and verify licensure. Policy Review Tool to analyze complex policies quickly.

features.name: Client Communication Tools
features.description: AI Letter & Rebuttal Writer to draft carrier emails and denial responses. Client Update Generator to auto-write personalized updates.

features.name: Reporting and Analytics
features.description: Claim Summary Reports to summarize claims, timelines, coverages, scope, and contention points.

features.name: Mobile Accessibility
features.description: Not explicitly mentioned in the content.

features.name: Integration Capabilities
features.description: No explicit third-party integration list provided, but a demo booking link points to fulcrumprocrm.com. The AI functionality integrates with the claim process.

features.name: Smart Search
features.description: AI-powered search connected to an industry-specific knowledge base (e.g., Chris Voss negotiation tactics).

features.name: Onboarding & Support
features.description: 90-minute setup & strategy call, weekly expert-led Zoom calls with Mathew Mulholland, Brelly Community on Skool, monthly 1:1 check-ins with the founder.

statistics.weekly_cost_savings: Up to $800/week in research time and staffing costs.

unique_value_propositions: Boost claim handling 3x faster with automation.
Smart Claims Copilot trained specifically for Public Adjusters, Roofers, Contractors, Homeowners.
AI assistant designed for real adjusters, not tech teams, avoiding complexities and carrier-facing dashboards.
Focus on reclaiming time (500+ hours/year) and boosting success.
No complicated setup, pre-loaded prompts, user judgment prioritized.
Built to address public adjusters' daily grind and stalled claims.
competitive_advantages.market_positioning: Positions itself as an essential AI-powered public adjuster software that automates tasks and wins settlements, addressing pain points like paperwork overload and stalled claims. Aims to empower users to get claims paid fully, fairly, and fast.
competitive_advantages.customer_testimonials_case_studies: No explicit testimonials or case studies provided on this page.
competitive_advantages.industry_partnerships: Not explicitly mentioned, beyond internal 'Mat’s AI Mastermind' resources.

marketing_strategies: Emphasis on 'Schedule a Demo' for lead generation.
Highlighting specific time and cost savings.
Promoting AI as a 'copilot' and 'assistant' to augment human work.
Offering comprehensive onboarding and ongoing expert support (Zoom calls, Skool community, founder check-ins).
Positioning as a solution to common industry pain points (paperwork, slow claims, generic software).
market_positioning.thought_leadership: Leveraging 'Mathew Mulholland' (industry expert and founder) for weekly calls and 1:1 check-ins. 'Mat’s AI Mastermind' as a resource.
